name: The Sacred Shores
description:
This game was made for the #TreasureJam game jam where you build any type of game with the theme of "Treasure". This was built over a few weeks on and off but it's a bit buggy so we're going to be expanding this in the coming weeks. We hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
Left Click - Sword Slash
Right Click - Arm Cannon
TAB - Open Riddle Book
M - Map

!! IMPORTANT !! - The map has island names on it that correlate with the riddles for each puzzle, so its important that you familiarise yourself with the map function (which you can open by pressing "M")!

If you find any bugs let us know.

Hugo: 3D Models, Sounds, UI, Level Design, Story

Damian: Unity, Environments, Programming
